mapper.select: SELECT TEAM_SEQ , LEADER_ID , TEAM_NAME , TEAM_IMAGE_PATH , HOMETOWN , INTRODUCTION , FOUNDATION_YMD , REG_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , SIDO_CODE , SIGUNGU_CODE FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_SEQ = #{teamSeq}

SELECT A.TEAM_SEQ , A.LEADER_ID , A.TEAM_NAME , A.TEAM_IMAGE_PATH , A.HOMETOWN , A.INTRODUCTION , A.FOUNDATION_YMD , A.REG_DATE , A.UPDATE_DATE , A.SIDO_CODE , A.SIGUNGU_CODE , COUNT(B.USER_SEQ) OVER(PARTITION BY B.TEAM_SEQ) AS TOT_MEMBER FROM TEAM A LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM TEAM_MEMBER WHERE WITHDRAWAL_YN != 'Y') B ON A.TEAM_SEQ = B.TEAM_SEQ WHERE 1=1
AND A.TEAM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{teamName} ||'%'
AND A.SIGUNGU_CODE = #{sigungu}
ORDER BY A.TEAM_NAME
